title: The Snow queen
brief_description: Gerda, a little girl who sets out on an amazing journey to find her friend Kay, who has fallen under the evil spell of the Snow Queen. On her journey she has to contend with the Summer garden witch, the robbers in the wood, and the Snow Queen herself. Only Gerda, helped by birds and animals, has the power to overcome them all.
